Fix for the signedness warning with gcc. Compact coap_address_t. Use coap_queue_t for all queues. OpenSSL warning for close alert should be info level. Fix OpenSSL log level not working. Change name of debug dll to -1d suffix under windows.
Add Debug DLL and Release DLL configurations in visual studio solution to build the library as a dll for windows.

Do not make exported symbols different between release and debug builds, this breaks the ABI of the DLL. Do not make reference to NDEBUG in public headers to modify the ABI. This macro is defined automatically in all windows projects and will create a lot of confusion.

Fix a problem with the use of control structures in sendmsg / recvmsg. These are not struct sockaddr, they are ip_pktinfo or ipv6_pktinfo, so local_interface->addr.size is irrelevant, even causing an overflow with writing zero bytes outside of the control structure on the stack, even though it happens to work because the buffer is large enough. Prevent invalid addresses from being used as source address with sendmsg. On linux, they are just ignored, so it is the same as not specifying one, but on windows they cause an error. In both case it is simpler not to include any control info if the intent is to let the interface be chosen by the network stack.
